actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the act relating to retirement annuities for teachers in the District of Columbia to increase the annuity payable to retired teachers.

summary.text: States that the annuity payable to retired teachers in the District of Columbia or to a surviving child shall not be less than the smallest primary insurance amount authorized by the Social Security Act, or, in the case of surviving children, three times such primary insurance amount divided by the number of surviving children entitled to an annuity, whichever is the lesser. Increases the annuity payable from the teachers retirement and annuity fund to a former teacher, if based on a separation prior to October 20, 1969, by $240; or, if payable to the spouse of a teacher or annuitant, by $132.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act relating to retirement annuities for teachers in the District of Columbia to increase the annuity payable to retired teachers.
